playersinbed.conf.ratio.tooltip: Percentage of players being asleep to start skipping night.
playersinbed.conf.sendmessagetochat.tool: Send chat message to all players when players go to bed.
playersinbed.conf.sendmessagetostatus.to: Send status message to all players when players go to bed.
playersinbed.conf.setspawnduringday.tool: Allow players to set their spawn point during day by clicking on a bed
playersinbed.conf.locale.tooltipr: Server locale used to send messages
